abstract: Yvo de Boer calls on all industrialized nations to put funds on the table ahead of Copenhagen meeting.
snippet: Yvo de Boer calls on all industrialized nations to put funds on the table ahead of Copenhagen meeting.
lead_paragraph: The head of the United Nations climate office said Wednesday that richer nations must pledge funds to poorer nations to make progress on a new agreement to curb global warming this year.

headline.main: U.N. Climate Chief Says Money for Poorer Nations Is Key to Copenhagen
